heading: HR00439
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE NDRRMC, PAGASA AND PHIVOLCS TO SUBMIT TO THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES A JOINT COMPREHENSIVE REPORT ON THE NATION'S PREPAREDNESS FOR NATURAL CALAMITIES BEFORE AND AFTER THEIR OCCURRENCES WITH THE END IN VIEW OF FORMULATING AN EFFICIENT AND SYSTEMATIC NATIONAL SCHEME OF REDUCING RISKS TO LIVES AND PROPERTIES
mother-bill statusstatus: Approved by the House on 2018-10-01, transmitted to the Senate on 2018-10-02 and received by the Senate on 2018-10-02 Substituted by HB08165
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00439
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE NDRRMC, PAGASA AND PHIVOLCS TO SUBMIT TO THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES A JOINT COMPREHENSIVE REPORT ON THE NATION'S PREPAREDNESS FOR NATURAL CALAMITIES BEFORE AND AFTER THEIR OCCURRENCES WITH THE END IN VIEW OF FORMULATING AN EFFICIENT AND SYSTEMATIC NATIONAL SCHEME OF REDUCING RISKS TO LIVES AND PROPERTIES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASTELO, WINSTON "WINNIE"
DATE FILED : 2016-10-04
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
MOTHER BILL: HB08165
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON NATIONAL DEFENSE AND SECURITY ON 2016-10-19
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2016-10-11;
